mapper.sql: u.id, u.accountNo, u.password, u.nickName, u.phoneNumber, u.lastLoginTime, u.loginTime, u.status, u.realName, u.createTime, u.updateTime, u.version, u.isDeleted, u.createBy, u.updateBy, u.locked

where 1=1 and u.id = #{condition.id} and u.accountNo = #{condition.accountNo} and u.password = #{condition.password} and u.nickName = #{condition.nickName} and u.phoneNumber = #{condition.phoneNumber} and u.lastLoginTime = #{condition.lastLoginTime} and u.loginTime = #{condition.loginTime} and u.status = #{condition.status} and u.realName = #{condition.realName} and u.createTime = #{condition.createTime} and u.updateTime = #{condition.updateTime} and u.version = #{condition.version} and u.isDeleted = #{condition.isDeleted} and u.createBy = #{condition.createBy} and u.updateBy = #{condition.updateBy} and u.locked = #{condition.locked}

where 1=1 and u.id = #{condition.id} and UPPER(u.accountNo) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.accountNo}),'%')) and UPPER(u.password) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.password}),'%')) and UPPER(u.nickName) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.nickName}),'%')) and UPPER(u.phoneNumber) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.phoneNumber}),'%')) and UPPER(u.lastLoginTime) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.lastLoginTime}),'%')) and UPPER(u.loginTime) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.loginTime}),'%')) and UPPER(u.status) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.status}),'%')) and UPPER(u.realName) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.realName}),'%')) and UPPER(u.createTime) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.createTime}),'%')) and UPPER(u.updateTime) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.updateTime}),'%')) and UPPER(u.version) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.version}),'%')) and UPPER(u.isDeleted) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.isDeleted}),'%')) and UPPER(u.createBy) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.createBy}),'%')) and UPPER(u.updateBy) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.updateBy}),'%')) and UPPER(u.locked) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.locked}),'%'))
mapper.update: update user set accountNo=#{accountNo}, password=#{password}, nickName=#{nickName}, phoneNumber=#{phoneNumber}, lastLoginTime=#{lastLoginTime}, loginTime=#{loginTime}, status=#{status}, realName=#{realName}, createTime=#{createTime}, updateTime=#{updateTime}, version=#{version}, isDeleted=#{isDeleted}, createBy=#{createBy}, updateBy=#{updateBy}, locked=#{locked}, where id=#{id} and version = #{version}-1
mapper.select: select from user u where u.id = #{id} and u.isDeleted = false
